item.title: The Myth of Topology
item.description: Let me be clear. I like topology. And I like how it rears its head in materials. It has led to the most striking advances in all of condensed matter (Fractional Quantum Hall) and has led to paradigms that allow us to understand things a lot better. BUT, at the same time: it has set ablaze a firestorm of buzz words with little coherency. Here’s all the ways I know about topology in condensed matter: I’m going to rant a bit here.
